Tanning hides
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man standing among wooden barrels is holding a piece of animal skin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hides and skins; Interiors; Tanning; Wheat (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This man may be Ben Magill as identified in ES 0380.
On front of image, 61-263; (TVA KX 629); Tanning Hides; 1939. On back, ORO 61-263.
